energy_t Struct Reference
[MAC scanning system]

Detailed Description

Structure used to keep track of how much energy is received on each scanned channel.

This is only used during the coordinator's energy scan.

See also:
macFindClearChannel().

Definition at line 108 of file mac_scan.c.


Data Fields

u8 currentChannel
 Channel that we're currently scanning.
u8 timerID
 ID of channel scan timer, return value of macSetAlarm.
u8 randomVal
 Random value, used for choosing a channel.
u16 energy [MAX_CHANNEL+1]
 Accumulated energy value, one for each channel.
